h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Location
content: Once you get into Bushui Cave, unlock the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine and keep following the path deeper into the cave to encounter Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once you get into Bushui Cave, unlock the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine and keep following the path deeper into the cave to encounter Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top.
